overview:
Miki Devic, Entrepreneur & Investor

Co-Founder :#httpool Group - httpool.com #Noovo.com #drmtm.com #unlike.net #devexo.com #GlobalTelcom.de

Miki Devic, serial entrepreneur and digital advertising expert, working in Digital Media since 1996. A pioneer in the German online media industry, Miki has from 1996 onwards worked for world class brands on an international basis and has successfully led strategy, planning and execution of web initiatives for brands like : Deutsche Telekom, Mercedes-Benz, Lufthansa, intel, Chrysler, Apple, Amazon and Henkel. Miki is the co-author of ” Sponsoring on the Web “, a guide to Sponsoring on the web, published by the German Multimedia Association.

Companies : httpool Group : www.httpool.com unlike city Guides : www.unlike.net Devexo-Deutsche Venture Exchange www.devexo.com DreamTeamClothing , www.drmtm.com GTCom - www.globaltelcom.de Noovo - www.noovo.com

Miki has co-founded httpool Group in 2007, a full-service online & mobile advertising provider specialized on international and emerging markets and providing centralized online marketing strategy, media planning, media buying, campaign implementation and publisher representation services to advertisers and media agencies in more than 30 countries to date. Established in 2000 httpool Group - www.httpool.com - currently employs 120+ online &mobile marketing specialists across 20 countries around the globe, covering all advertising relevant regions globally. Through its various offices in Europe, Asia, India and LatAM, the representation of leading global and local online advertising networks, 10.000+ publishers, Ad-Exchanges, world-class and proprietary online and mobile advertising technology solutions, httpool provides a broad range of online advertising products, services and technologies worlds leading brands and agencies. Miki has furthermore co-founded Noovo.com, based in Palo Alto, California. A social entertainment start-up, engaging millions of users in Apps on Facebook - www.noovo.com , as well as Berlin-based unlike city guides -unlike.net , the coolest city-guide on the planet available across web and all mobile platforms. Miki has furthermore co-founded GTCom-GlobalTelcom a telecom services company providing state-of-the-art MVNO & MVNE telecom services. Miki has co-founded DreamTeamClothing- www.drmtm.com - an international Street wear brand and online-shop, online-magazine & BLOG on youth-culture, street-art, design and music. . Miki enjoys music, people, travel, Technology, cars and sports.
